item.description: We'll meet with Captain Bob on the Volsunga IV leaving from Stony Creek Town Dock.  You’ll see 25 stoney islets with 85 homes built mostly during Victorian Era, widow walks, gingerbread trimmings, and genteel gazebos.   Afterward, we’ll go nearby for lunch.   Be there by 10:30 am to park, purchase ticket, and be onboard by 10:45 am.   Adm. $10.   To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229.   Directions to 4 Indian Point Road:   Rt. 9S to I-95S, take Exit 56, ramp end turn right, go 2 miles to 4‑way stop, stay straight toward shore under RR trestle, follow down toward water, parking on main roads.   You’ll find Volunga IV at end of Town Dock on right.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Thimble Islands Cruise
